label: Specialised AAC services
description: Explore a comprehensive collection of assistive technology resources, guides, and materials from various specialized services across England.

label: Local AAC
description: Find resources designed to support home learning and education for children and young people with special educational needs and disabilities (SEND).

label: AAC Services
description: Specialised AAC services assess for and provide appropriate assistive technologies for people with complex communication difficulties and a clear discrepancy between their understanding and their ability to speak.

label: EC Services
description: Specialised EC services assess for and provide assistive technologies for people whose severe disabilities restrict independent use of standard controls for their environment and technology.
